query:
-- Get count of islands per atoll currently
SELECT a.id, a.name, COUNT(p.id) as island_count
FROM atolls a
LEFT JOIN places p ON a.id = p.atollId AND p.type = 'island'
GROUP BY a.id, a.name
ORDER BY a.id;
